name: myvue
description: ```bash     <script>         let data ={             msg:'hello vue'         }         let pokemon = {             img: 'src',             img:{                 src: 'str',                 alt: 'str'             },             title: 'str / html',             description: 'str / html',             price: 'number',             price:{                 type: 'str',                 count: 'number',             },             inventory: 'number',            }         let vm = new Vue({             el:'#app',             data,         })     </script> ``` ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Terry-Hsieh/myvue/master/imgstore/1.jpg "picture")
